Dating: NEW KINGDOM (not before); LATE PERIOD ?; LATE PERIOD (not after)
Name: Canopic jar
Description: This limestone canopic jar, which was probably part of the Ã‰. de Meester de Ravestein collection, is anepigraphic. The lid takes the form of a canine head, of which the muzzle and the ears are very damaged. The date of the piece is difficult to specifiy; nevertheless its form was particularly in vogue in the Late Period and more specifically at the time of the 26th Dynasty.
